## Buffer.getBuffer() method

Returns the underlying WebGLBuffer once ready.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBuffer(): Promise<WebGLBuffer>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;WebGLBuffer&gt;
